animal.question: I say 'Meow', I like to drink milk, and I love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I love when you pour milk in a bowl.
😴 I like to take long naps.

animal.question: I go 'Woof', I wag my tail, and I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch in the park.
🏠 I live in a dog house.

animal.question: I quack, I swim in the water, and I like to eat bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
तालाब I like to swim in a pond.
🌾 I like to eat seeds.

animal.question: I say 'Moo', I give you milk, and I like to eat grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I live on a farm.
🔔 I have a bell around my neck.
🌱 I eat lots of green grass.

animal.question: I hop, I have long ears, and I love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I wiggle my nose.
🍃 I like to hide in the grass.
🐾 I have a fluffy tail.

animal.question: I have a long trunk, big ears, and I love to eat peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I can pick up peanuts with my nose.
🐘 I am very big and gray.
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I roar, I have a mane, and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I live in Africa.
🦁 My roar can be heard from far away.
🥩 I like to eat meat.

animal.question: I hiss, I slither on the ground, and some of us are poisonous. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have scales.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🔥 I stick out my tongue to smell.

animal.question: I swing from trees, I love bananas, and I make silly faces. What am I?

hints.text: 🙊 I live in the jungle.
🍌 I peel bananas to eat.
🌿 I use my tail to help me swing.

animal.question: I have a shell, I move very slowly, and I can hide my head inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I live on land or in the water.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🏡 My shell is my house.

ocean.question: I swim in the sea and have big teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a fish.
🌊 I live in the ocean.
🦷 People are sometimes scared of me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm not very fast.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🏖️ You might see me on the beach.

ocean.question: I'm a big animal that lives in the sea and blows water out of my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am very large.
💦 I can make a big splash.
💙 I live in the ocean and sing songs.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have many arms.
✨ I can change color to hide.
💧 I live under the sea.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in a coral reef. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am small and brightly colored
🏠 I live in a coral reef with anemones
🎬 I starred in a movie about finding me.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk sideways on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I have claws.
🚶 I walk in a funny way.
🏖️ I like to hide under rocks.

ocean.question: I'm a flat fish that sometimes hides in the sand. What am I?

hints.text: ♦️ I am shaped like a diamond!
🥻 I can be many different colors.
🌊 I like to hide on the bottom of the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a very tiny sea animal that many other animals eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🔎 You need a microscope to see me!
🐳 Whales eat me
🌾 I am a type of plankton.

ocean.question: I look like a plant, but I'm actually an animal that lives in the ocean and has stinging tentacles. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I look like a plant, but I'm not!
🤕 If you touch me, it might sting!
🌊 I sway in the water.

ocean.question: I am a long, thin fish that looks like a snake and hides in rocks. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I don't have scales, but I am a fish.
🪨 I like to hide in the rocks.
🌊 I swim like a snake!
